title: Creating a System of Equations From Relevant Variables
text: Using g to represent the number of girls and a to represent the number of adults, we know $$75g+30a=765$$ from the given information. Furthermore, since the number of girls is 3 times the number of adults, we know that $$g=3a$$. This can be rewritten as $$g-3a=0$$ for our second equation.

title: How to Use the Systems of Equations
text: Solve the two equations as a normal system of equations to find the values of the two variables.
